summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Draft vs Final script workflow for Unit 3 Global Issues project. All requested features verified: Day 1 shows 3 guiding questions, Day 4 is labeled as DRAFT Script with teacher correction warning, Day 5 has FINAL script/rehearsal notes/media link fields, Teacher Panel correctly displays Day 4 as 'Draft Script' and Day 5 as 'Final Script & Production' with proper labels.

Group creation with podcast/vlog types

Day 1 update with topic, problem, importance fields
Day 4 update with draft_script field
Day 5 update with final_script, rehearsal_notes, media_link fields

Teacher login authentication with 'profesor2024'
Day 1 form shows 3 guiding questions (topic, problem, importance)
Day 1 form has TURN IN BOX with requirements checklist
Day 1 form shows global issues suggestions (poverty, inequality, pollution, climate change, homelessness, racism)
Day 4 form labeled as 'DAY 4: DRAFT SCRIPT'
Day 4 form shows teacher correction warning: 'This is your DRAFT. Your teacher will correct it. You will write the FINAL version on Day 5.'

Day 4 form shows requirements (6 Second Conditional, 4+ Indefinite Pronouns, 2:00 min, 3 students)
Day 5 form labeled as 'DAY 5: FINAL SCRIPT, REHEARSAL & RECORDING'
Day 5 form has FINAL corrected script textarea (data-testid='day5-final-script')
Day 5 form has rehearsal notes textarea (data-testid='day5-rehearsal')
Day 5 form has media link input (data-testid='day5-link')

Save and Complete buttons functional on all days
